title: r/Entitledparents "GIVE MY SON YOUR PLAYSTATION 5! NOW!"
description: r/Entitledparents In today's episode, Karen goes out shopping for a PS5 to give to her precious little angel. Unfortunately, PS5s are in hot demand right now, so the store was all sold out. OP managed to buy the last one, so Karen does the only logical thing: she tries to buy OP's console for less than he just purchased it. When that doesn't work, she tries to steal it from him... twice!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
